attributes.action: To use his influence to compel his Foreign secretary to publish the draft report (sometimes known as the ‘Williams draft’) whose existence has been admitted by the Foreign office and which was referred to in the Hutton Enquiry but whose content the Foreign Office refuse to disclose even under several Freedom of Information Requests.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe there was something intrinsically shady in the information given and the actions pursued by the government in the lead up to the Iraq War and I believe the release of this draft report will throw more light on their behaviour and it is therefore in the public interest for the draft report to be published in full.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
